name: Judge

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 30.

skills.name: Eviscerate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases by 10% for each debuff on the target, stacking up to a maximum of 100%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Blade Dance
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Fills the Turn Meter by 10% for each critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Chaos Armor
skills.raw_description: Each time this Champion is hit, has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff OR a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff OR a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff OR a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on the attacker for 1 turn.
